content.question: All of the following were objectives of W.E.B. DuBois EXCEPT

choices.label: the total enfranchisement of all eligible Black citizens
the establishment of an organization to seek legal redress of Black grievances
the establishment of Black political power
cooperation with White people in obtaining Black progress
the implementation of Booker T. Washington’s program for Black progress

content.answer: the implementation of Booker T. Washington’s program for Black progress

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
